description: An adult spider with prominent eyes and legs sits on a large leaf and talks to a smaller spider. The larger spider is recounting a past event using a common human idiom about conception, which is absurd when applied to spiders, creating an ironic and surreal scenario. The smaller spider appears attentive. The scene takes place on a large leaf.
caption: "Of course, that was back in the days when you were just a twinkle in your father's eyes."
